page.title: 03Games in 1985
page.content: My favourite game is on my{computer ,it is called{Elite.Elite}is a game in space where you buy , sell and move from Space station to Space station. Sometimes you get attacked by Bounty Hunters and pirates.Your armament is a forward{Laser Cannon}and four missiles .In the Game there are eight different Galaxies with three hundred and fifty planets in each.The starter planet is Lave. You have seven light years of fuel which you can get at any space station.You start with one hundred credits to buy whatever you want. Another indoor game that I play is {Squash.}There is a lot of running around and you score just a bit like {tennis.}The only time you can get some points is when you're serving.The game is in a room with{red lines}on the wall.The red lines are{boundary lines.
